title: How to Prevent Others from Seeing Posts You Like on Facebook

steps.title: You can only hide your liked posts if you have a private account.
steps.content: You can only hide your liked posts if you have a private account. Whenever you like a photo, your username will appear in the list of users who have liked the post. Your followers may also see Liked by [your username] and 4 others or similar. [1] X Research source Your likes will only be hidden if you have a private account with no followers. Followers of your private account can still see your likes. If your goal is to hide likes from everyone, consider making a private, alternate account so you can browse incognito. If needed, you can unlike the post to remove it. While you can't hide your Like activity on posts, you can hide the Likes section on your profile.

steps.title: Navigate to your profile page.
steps.content: Navigate to your profile page. Click your profile icon in the top-right corner, then click your name. You can only change this option using a desktop browser. There's currently no way to change this setting on the Facebook app or mobile website.

steps.title: Scroll down to "Likes".
steps.content: Scroll down to "Likes". This section is near the bottom of your page. If you can't find it, click the More tab underneath your name and select Likes.

steps.title: Click ••• next to "Likes".
steps.content: Click ••• next to "Likes". A menu will open.

steps.title: Click Edit the Privacy of Your Likes.
steps.content: Click Edit the Privacy of Your Likes . This is the second option.

steps.title: Click the current setting.
steps.content: Click the current setting. This may be set to Public or Friends .

steps.title: Select Only me.
steps.content: Select Only me . This is the third option.

steps.title: Click Save.
steps.content: Click Save . Your settings will be saved. The Likes section on your profile will be hidden from all users.
